title: I get this bug every day
body:
I get this bug in champ select every day and it feels like every time i queue up for a game it's a dice roll on the game keeping me disconnected while it's my turn to pick and I end up with situations like this where I can talk to my teammates and discuss how I'm disconnected from the game. 
https://i.imgur.com/zgQk5f5.jpg

Has anyone else experienced this and do you have any suggestions on fixing it?

replies.body: woah i can post on this one

This is a rather iffy connection issue that can happen randomly if your network has a hard time getting a stable signal with our servers. You can do some quick troubleshooting using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but also check out this new beta [**Lag Report**](https://lagreport.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/) page we have! This page has some options to see what kind of connections that other players around your area have been getting to see if there are any issues or if it's centered on your network.
